content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, thank you for considering my apartment for rent. What is your budget for renting a 25-square meter apartment in Mannheim?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I have a budget of 500 Euros per month. I am looking for the lowest possible rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand that you are looking for the lowest possible rental price. Based on the current market rates in Mannheim, I would be able to offer you the apartment for 450 Euros per month, which is below your budget. Would you be interested in renting the apartment at this price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, I agree to the price of 450 Euros per month.

Thank you for your offer. I will sign the lease agreement.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Great to hear that you agree to the rental price of 450 Euros per month. I am glad that I could help you find a suitable apartment within your budget. Please let me know if you need any further assistance with the lease agreement or any other matter.
name: Heinrich Heine
